name: Apple Lightning to VGA Adapter - ZML

reviews.name: Apple Lightning to VGA Adapter - ZML
reviews.reviewText: Works flawlessly on my iPad mini2!! The picture is of the older 30 pin model but the this model is of the new 8 pin lightning connection.
reviews.title: Best Price Available

reviews.name: Apple Lightning to VGA Adapter - ZML
reviews.reviewText: Got it to hook my iPad mini to my tv as well as a projector (I am a teacher). Item was exactly as described. Bought a VGA monitor cable to connect to TV and projector and worked perfect the first try. Very pleased.
reviews.title: Exactly as expected

reviews.name: Apple Lightning to VGA Adapter - ZML
reviews.reviewText: First, ignore the current picture. The adapter really does have the lightning connector. Be sure to attach the VGA device (monitor, projector, TV, etc.) to the adapter and then plug the adapter into your iPad. I am using this with an iPad Mini and it worked with no other setup required on my part.
reviews.title: It just works!

reviews.name: Apple Lightning to VGA Adapter - ZML
reviews.reviewText: This is small and very easy to use. Works great!
reviews.title: Works great

reviews.name: Apple Lightning to VGA Adapter - ZML
reviews.reviewText: The photo is wrong - it shows the old iPhone 4 adpapter but it is a Lightning to VGA. I got this to do presentations/demos from my iPhone 6/iPad mini to large LCD displays. It works great. I ordered the HDMI version as well.
reviews.title: Great for iPhone/iPad presentations
